alert.note: Alert for Eddy; Griggs; Nelson (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 12:08PM CDT until September 19 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NELSON...NORTHWESTERN GRIGGS AND EASTERN EDDY COUNTIES... At 1207 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Brantford, or 29 miles south of Devils Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Red Willow Lake, Tolna and Pekin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
